title: LoL World Championship Final viewing party ticket
body: any mod here to tell me if it is possible to post a link to sell 2 tickets to the cinemaxx viewing party in berlin on saturday without getting banned? Sadly i cant attend it and i have my 2 tickets left, so im trying to find someone to buy them. Maybe someone reading the forum is interested, but since advertising in general is forbidden im not quite sure if im allowed to post it?
